title: Koi To Karada No Kyoukaisen
alternative_title: 恋とカラダの境界線 ; Border of Love and Body ; Love and Body's Borderline ; Love Workshop
status: 恋とカラダの境界線 ; Border of Love and Body ; Love and Body's Borderline ; Love Workshop
description:
Description :
        Right after he was dumped, Tarou got a call from his newly-wed older sister, asking him to babysit her husband's teenage son. Tarou arrived to find a disrespectful 17-year-old kid who seemed to hate his guts. How would Tarou cope with the situation?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2 : The Gift Of Happiness
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Border Of Love And Body
